comment.author: 7476336@N07
comment._content: The castle down the slope from Glasgow University is a fake! It's a replica built for the 1888 exhibition. The original Bishop's Castle was demolished in 1789 and the site was used for Glasgow Royal Infirmary. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bishop's_Castle,_Glasgow You can see the Infirmary behind the Cathedral in this photo. www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/3450340900/
